alert.note: Alert for Fremont (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 26 at 1:50PM MDT until August 26 at 2:15PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Fremont County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 215 PM MDT. * At 150 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ponds Lodge, or 16 miles south of Henrys Lake, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Island Park Village, Shotgun Village, Ponds Lodge, Macks Inn, Last Chance, Island Park Reservoir, Big Springs, and Harriman State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If on or near Island Park Reservoir, get away from the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 15 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
